summary: An example script that uses the asynchronous ccxt.pro library to retrieve OHLCV (open‑high‑low‑close‑volume) candle data for a large number of cryptocurrency symbols concurrently, aggregating the results for further processing or storage.
business_intent: Enable bulk collection of historical market price data across many trading pairs to support analysis, back‑testing, or feeding trading systems with up‑to‑date candle information.
